ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, Hottie, your character is too powerful. I ll have to lay down a few lines here: He can t have any powers that could destroy a world, in fact, his weapons

Ok, Hottie, your character is too powerful. I'll have to lay down a 
few lines here: He can't have any powers that could destroy a world, 
in fact, his weapons must be reasonable. If you want to have a 
weapon (or armour for that matter) that doesn't exist, is perhaps 
slightly more powerful, or that MIGHT cause some problems, you MUST 
email a council member and then the rest of the coucil will review 
it. None of Apocalypse's weapons can be anymore devastating than any 
other bot's weapons which are already in the RPG unless you've done 
that. (which you haven't)

The rules specifically state that if you want to bring in a new 
weapon email the council for approval.

If you want to have a powerful weapon for a storyline purpose, then 
you also have to talk to the council members. If you want to argue, 
you have my email address, but for now, you have to post that your 
weapons are normal. By normal, I mean that your fireballs are two 
feet in diametre at max, and will remain like that unless you can 
convince me that they should be 25ft in diametre.

Also, if a council member suggests that your character is too 
powerful, then you should listen. More often than not, they know 
what they are talking about.

Last thing for this post, if nobody can see you in the clouds, then 
you can't see them in the clouds. So don't post for your character 
seeing other characters. And please don't tell me he's omnicient...


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Hottie4u2have1@a... wrote:
> he can control his power    so its not gonna destroy a world
